Uses of Class
common.SequentialByteReader

  • Packages that use SequentialByteReader 
    Package Description
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.
    heif.boxes
    Classes for parsing and representing individual HEIF-structured boxes.
    tif
    Classes for parsing and manipulating TIFF-based files.
    webp

      Constructs a Box by reading its header from the specified SequentialByteReader.

      Constructs a ColourInformationBox from a parent Box and a byte reader.

      DataInformationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing additional information from other contained boxes, specifically dref - Data Reference Box and its nested contained boxes, where further additional information on URL location and name is provided.
      DataReferenceBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader) 
      FileTypeBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs a FileTypeBox, parsing its fields from the specified SequentialByteReader.
      FullBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, extending the parent class Box to provide additional information.
      HandlerBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, extending the super class FullBox to provide more specific information about this box.
      ImageRotationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object whose aim is to retrieve the angle (in anti-clockwise direction) in units of degrees.
      ImageSpatialExtentsProperty(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object whose aim is to gather information both on width and height of the associated image item.
      ItemDataBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing additional data of metadata items.
      ItemInfoEntry(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Parses an ItemInfoEntry from the specified reader.
      ItemInformationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Parses the ItemInformationBox from the specified reader.
      ItemLocationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemLocationBox by parsing the provided iloc box data.
      ItemPropertiesBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemPropertiesBox by reading the ipco (property container) and one or more ipma (item-property association) boxes.
      ItemPropertyAssociationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemPropertyAssociationBox object, parsing its structure from the specified SequentialByteReader.
      ItemPropertyContainerBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemPropertyContainerBox resource by reading sequential boxes.
      ItemProtectionBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing an array of item protection information, for use by the Item Information Box.
      ItemReferenceBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs an ItemReferenceBox, reading its references from the specified SequentialByteReader resource.
      MetaBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs a MetaBox, parsing its fields from the specified SequentialByteReader.
      OriginalFormatBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader) 
      PixelInformationBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs a PixelInformationBox by parsing the specified box header and its content.
      PrimaryItemBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      Constructs a PrimaryItemBox, reading its fields from the specified SequentialByteReader parameter.
      ProtectionSchemeInfoBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)

      Constructs a SingleItemTypeReferenceBox by reading its fields from the given SequentialByteReader.
